description: A class for defining a set of geographical coordinates (apparently misnamed).

LatitudeDegreesMeasure.title: Location Coordinate. Latitude_ Degrees. Measure
LatitudeDegreesMeasure.description: The degree component of a latitude measured in degrees and minutes.

LongitudeDegreesMeasure.title: Location Coordinate. Longitude_ Degrees. Measure
LongitudeDegreesMeasure.description: The degree component of a longitude measured in degrees and minutes.
